hero.title: Halyna Hryn
hero.subtitle: Full-stack Developer
hero.tagline: I love turning ideas into clean, scalable code using React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.

about.title: About Me
description: Full-stack web developer with a strong focus on frontend using React, TypeScript, and Node.js.
Build modern, responsive websites that look great on any device.
Passionate about writing clean, scalable, and maintainable code.
Experienced in collaborating effectively in teams and with software testers.
Constantly improving my skills and quick to learn new technologies.
Enjoy collaborating on exciting projects and sharing knowledge.
Outside of coding, I enjoy coffee, reading, traveling, and exploring new ideas.
